duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing total store recovery, refills, culling, and replenishing of product across multiple departments in the store as needed.
Assisting with loading, unloading, and moving heavy, bulky products to support in-stock conditions when needed.
Checking shipments for out-of-date and damaged product to ensure freshness and quality.
Reporting all out-of-date and damaged product issues to the Manager.
Assisting with stocking and refilling merchandise as needed.
Collecting carts from the parking lot and organizing, cleaning, emptying bins, and preparing the sales floor.
Eliminating cardboard and trash on shelves and merchandising fixtures, and cleaning shelves and all merchandising fixtures to keep the sales floor area clean and safe.
Adhering to all SOPs for safety and sanitation to minimize shrink through careful handling of product.
Achieving productivity standards and complying with all federal, state, and company regulations and standards for product freshness, food safety, and sanitation.

Maintaining a clean and safe store environment for the customer shopping experience and providing customer service by answering product-related questions and assisting customers in a friendly manner. Scanning customer items and completing transactions in a fast and friendly manner, as needed.
